creditline: Gift of Anne White in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Art
description: street scene in Paris with sculptures on wide columns flaking street in background; standing woman wearing a Roman-style draped gown, long earrings and elbow-length gloves, with her arms raised; two soldiers wearing formal dress uniforms with white belts and white caps rushing toward woman--one in foreground at left, one in background behind cloud of smoke at left
title: Pont Alexandre III, Paris
